title: DDFP 401: Week 9 preview, Gerald McCoy & Dashon Goldson
itunes:title: DDFP 401: Week 9 preview, Gerald McCoy & Dashon Goldson
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank, Patrick Claybon and Matt "Money" Smith to make their Week 9 “Red Challenge Flag" picks. Then, Shek interviews Gerald McCoy about his performance this season, his love of superheroes and his thoughts on Jameis Winston's lead block. Plus, Dashon Goldson sits down with Shek to discuss the newly energized Kirk Cousins, his favorite NFL uniform and who's going to win the NFC East. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
